pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, April 8, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with President of Inuit Tapiriit Kanatami Natan Obed, will co-chair the virtual meeting of the Inuit-Crown Partnership Committee. 

Opening statements from the Prime Minister and the President of Inuit Tapiriit Kanatami Natan Obed will be streamed live on the Prime Minister’s official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/CanadianPM.
